title: dodix equivalent in Fidelity brokerage
text:
You may want to consider the Baird Core Plus Bond Fund Investor Class (BCOSX).

The fund has an 0.55% expense ratio, $2.5K minimum, and no transaction fee.

The institutional share class (BCOIX) is also available via Fidelity.

This share class has an 0.30% expense ratio, $25K minimum, and $49.95 transaction fee.

You can ask Fidelity to convert BCOSX shares to BCOIX shares when the balance is greater than $25K.

I've had Fidelity convert investor shares to institutional shares of other funds at no cost.

There is an online option to make additional purchases of many transaction fee funds for only $5.
description: Dodix has $75 purchase fee on fidelity brokerage. Any equivalent funds which are NTF? - 20522
